user.opis: Jack Sparrow was a legendary pirate of the Seven Seas, and the irreverent trickster of the Caribbean.
user.pojava: The Curse of the Black Pearl

user.opis: In his life, Will Turner was an accomplished blacksmith by trade, an excellent swordsman by pursuit and a budding pirate by fate.
user.pojava: The Curse of the Black Pearl

user.opis: A fearsome captain, a ruthless and heartless beast, striking terror into the bravest of sailors as the devil of the deep.
The Kraken was a legendary sea monster, a leviathan sent to prey on unwary ships and mariners.
Armando Salazar was the legendary and terrifying pirate hunter who haunted the Caribbean.
